text:
''Color:'' Silver
''Associated [[Dragonmark|dragonmark]]:'' [[Making|Mark of Making]]
''Associated [[Plane|plane]]:'' [[Fernia]]
''Associated [[Month|Khorvaire calendar]]:'' 4th When Eyre is full, a keen-eyed observer can pick out on its surface a shadowy shape that vaguely resembles an anvil. According to [[druid]]ic belief, those born under Eyre inherit a solid, practical nature and a gift for nature crafts. Some smiths will wait until Eyre is full to work on especially difficult projects, and House [[Cannith]] [[enclave]]s often hold celebrations when the Anvil is full in the sky.
title: Eyre
tooltip: moon associated with Fernia; 4th month of the year
